啗字的基本解释

啗
dàn
同“啖”。

啗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［dàn］
［《廣韻》徒濫切，去闞，定。］
［《廣韻》徒敢切，上敢，定。］
亦作“嚪1”。
(1)食，吃。
(2)指人中风时口颤动貌。
(3)使吃；请吃。
(4)含，包含。参见“啗函”。
(5)利诱。

啗字的康熙字典解释

【丑集上】【口字部】　啗； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页196第04
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?徒濫切，音憺。【說文】食也。【廣韻】噉也。【晉語】主孟啗我。【戰國策】膳啗之嗛于口。【韓非子·外儲說】孔子先飯黍，而後啗桃。【宋玉·風賦】啗齰嗽獲。　又以利餌人亦曰啗。【史記·高帝紀】使酈生陸賈徃說秦將，啗以利。又【廣韻】徒敢切【集韻】杜覽切【正韻】徒覽切，?音淡。與啖同。

Basic explanation of words
taste
dàn

taste
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［dàn］
["Guangyun" cut indiscriminately, go to Kan, set. ]
["Guangyun" dare to cut only, dare to go, set. ]
Also known as "嚪1".
(1) Eat, eat.
(2) Refers to the appearance of a person's mouth trembling during a stroke.
(3) Make eat; please eat.
(4) Contains, contains. See "letter".
(5) Lure.
taste
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Chou Ji 1] [Words Department] 　啖; Kangxi strokes: 11; Page number: page 196 04
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Positive Rhyme]? [Said Wen] Food also. [Guang Yun] Suck too. [Jin dialect] Lord Meng yells at me. [Warring States Policy] The food is in the mouth. [Han Feizi·Foreign Reserve said] Confucius first eats rice, then eats peaches. 【Song Yu·Feng Fu】Cough and catch.　Anyone also said with profit. [Historical Records · Gao Di Ji] Make Li Sheng Lu Jiayu talk about the generals of Qin and take advantage. Also [Guang Yun] Dare to cut [Ji Yun] Du Lan and [Zheng Yun] To view and cut, the sound is light. Same as tweeting.
